column5: Is there anywaher on the Nottawasaga river that I am currently not allowed to fish?  I haven't seen many reports on Nottawasaga with regards to rainbows.  Are there any in there?
The Notty has closed areas as well as C & R only.  you should really grab some regs.

Oh I have got them. Guess I needed to know where the Boyne was.  I didn't really word the question properly and I mistook the mad river for the Boyne so it seemed like a huge area that was C and R fish. I mapquested the boyne river but the actual river doesn't show up on the map, only a boyne river rd.  So I believe the Boyne is South of 89 so if I fish in Flos township I don't think there are any 'no fishing areas'.  Just wanted to be sure. C an R is only between Boyne and Pine but I am pretty sure where I am looking is good.  I beleive I am looking to fish between the pine and Wasaga beach somewhere. Just didn't want to break any laws. Thanks
Shes icing up pretty good right now, might give it a try this afternoon out of boredom...lol
Take the road just past the bridge heading to Angus. Follow it til the end. Have a nice walk. Lots of water to cover there.
McKinnon Rd into the swamp? 99.9% is posted.

Was up at Wasaga near the mouth today, big chucks of ice floating, very sharp and lost two lures that cut off 10# PP. Locals were saying the last few days the ice have been too much and nobody is really fishing the area.
WHAT???????Whats going on with all these postings?
They are all edited... swirled backgrounds, Sobeys, Midas and Valuevillage...  "let the good times roll.."  G
